movie.overview: A boy experiences first love, friendships and injustices growing up in 1960s Taiwan.
movie.title: A Brighter Summer Day

results.overview: Kenneth Feinberg, a powerful D.C. lawyer appointed Special Master of the 9/11 Fund, fights off the cynicism, bureaucracy, and politics associated with administering government funds and, in doing so, discovers what life is worth.
results.title: Worth

results.overview: A group of criminals are brought together under mysterious circumstances and have to work together to uncover what's really going on when their simple job goes completely sideways.
results.title: No Sudden Move

results.overview: On a hot summer day in the countryside, Ines, a young teenager, gets involved in a friendly ball game between boys her age, and among them Malik, the one she has a crush on.
results.title: One of the Boys

results.overview: To save her unborn child, she had to fight for the right to die. A True Story
results.title: A Case for Life

results.overview: In a rural town where football is war and the quarterback is king, comes a tense re-imagining of MACBETH with a bloody twist to prove that Lady and King Macbeth didn't kill for power - They killed for love.
results.title: Forsaken

results.overview: Those Were the Days is a Hong Kong Drama starring Eric Tsang
results.title: Those Were the Days

results.original_title: ハイキュー!! 才能とセンス
results.overview: A compilation film depicting the match against Aoba Johsai High School in the second season of the anime series. It will also include new scenes portraying what happened after the match.
results.title: Haikyu!! The Movie: Talent and Sense

results.original_title: ハイキュー!! コンセプトの戦い
results.overview: A recap film depicting the match against Shiratorizawa Academy in the third season of the anime series.
results.title: Haikyu!! The Movie: Battle of Concepts

results.overview: Disenchanted with the movie industry, Chili Palmer tries the music industry, meeting and romancing a widow of a music executive along the way.
results.title: Be Cool

results.overview: Second Jerry Cotton movie. A ring of gangsters has been terrorizing New York City. Special agent Jerry Cotton is summoned by the FBI to help crack down on the Criminals and put them out of business. He doesnt pull any punches either.
results.title: Manhattan Night of Murder

results.overview: A famous poet in postwar Paris, scorned by the Left Bank youth, is in love with both his wife Eurydice and a mysterious princess. Seeking inspiration, the poet becomes obsessed and follows the princess from the world of the living to the land of the dead.
results.title: Orpheus

results.original_title: Jerry Cotton - Der Mörderclub von Brooklyn
results.overview: Fifth Jerry Cotton Movie. A rich capitalist is blackmailed and threatened with the murder of his daughter.
results.title: Murderers Club of Brooklyn

results.overview: An FBI agent is killed by the mob after making off with five million in gold bars in a robbery gone bad. Agent Jerry Cotton is called in to bring the gang to justice and find out where his dead pal hid the missing gold.
results.title: Deadly Shots on Broadway

results.overview: Fifteen-year-old Charlotte Flax is tired of her wacky mom moving their family to a different town any time she feels it is necessary. When they move to a small Massachusetts town and Mrs. Flax begins dating a shopkeeper, Charlotte and her 9-year-old sister, Kate, hope that they can finally settle down. But when Charlotte's attraction to an older man gets in the way, the family must learn to accept each other for who they truly are.
results.title: Mermaids

results.overview: Former London constable Nicholas Angel finds it difficult to adapt to his new assignment in the sleepy British village of Sandford. Not only does he miss the excitement of the big city, but he also has a well-meaning oaf for a partner. However, when a series of grisly accidents rocks Sandford, Angel smells something rotten in the idyllic village.
results.title: Hot Fuzz

results.overview: Hit man Cleve approaches writer/cop Dennis about a story for his next book: How Cleve made a living, working for one of the most powerful politicians in the country. To get the story right, they travel around the country to gather statements and evidence, while strong forces use any means they can to keep the story untold.
results.title: Best Seller

results.overview: A young girl turns into an A-List celebrity over night when her private journal is accidently published and becomes a best-seller.
results.title: Read It and Weep

results.overview: Outside the Australian town of Jindabyne, local man Stuart Kane is on a fishing trip with friends when they discover the body of a murdered girl.
results.title: Jindabyne

results.overview: When young dockworker Jude leaves Liverpool to find his estranged father in the United States, he is swept up by the waves of change that are re-shaping the nation. Jude falls in love with Lucy, who joins the growing anti-war movement. As the body count in Vietnam rises, political tensions at home spiral out of control and the star-crossed lovers find themselves in a psychedelic world gone mad.
results.title: Across the Universe

results.overview: Paul, a young idealist trying to figure out what he wants to do with his life, takes a job interviewing people for a marketing research firm. He moves in with aspiring pop singer Madeleine. Paul, however, is disillusioned by the growing commercialism in society, while Madeleine just wants to be successful. The story is told in a series of 15 unrelated vignettes.
results.title: Masculin Féminin
